clinical_study.brief_title: An Immunogenicity and Safety Study of Sabin Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine (Vero Cell) in 2-month-old Infants
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Immunogenicity and Safety of Sabin Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine (Vero Cell) in 2-month-old Infants

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this phase III study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of Sabin Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine (Vero cell) in 2-month-old infants.

detailed_description.textblock: The study is a randomized, double-blind, controlled randomized, double-blind, controlled clinical trial clinical trial. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of Sabin Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine (Vero cell) manufactured by Sinovac Vaccine Technology Co., Ltd in 2-month-old infants. The control vaccine is a commercialized Inactivated Poliovirus Vaccine manufactured by Sanofi Pasteur company. 1200 healthy infants between 60-90 days will be randomly assigned into experimental group or control group in the ratio 1:1.

primary_outcome.measure: The seroconversion rates (SCRs) of each group after primary immunization.
primary_outcome.description: Subjects whose pre-immune antibody level < 1:8 and post-immune antibody level ≥ 1:8, or those whose pre-immune antibody level ≥ 1:8 and the increase of post-immune antibody level ≥ 4 folds are considered seroconverted. Primary vaccination schedule: 3 doses with one month interval between doses (i.e., month 0, 1, 2).

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidences of solicited adverse events (AEs) of each group.
secondary_outcome.description: Solicited AEs occurred within 7 days after each injection will be collected.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidences of unsolicited adverse events (AEs) of each group.
secondary_outcome.description: Unsolicited AEs occurred within 30 days after each injection will be collected.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence of serious adverse events (SAEs) during the period of safety monitoring of each group.
secondary_outcome.description: SAEs during the period of safety monitoring will be collected.

secondary_outcome.measure: The post-immune antibody positive rate of each group after primary immunization.
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects whose post-immune antibody level ≥ 1:8 are considered antibody positive. Primary vaccination schedule: 3 doses with one month interval between doses (i.e., month 0, 1, 2).

secondary_outcome.measure: The post-immune geometric mean titer (GMT) of each group after primary immunization.
secondary_outcome.description: GMT of each group after primary immunization which lasts 60 days.

secondary_outcome.measure: The geometric mean fold increase (GMI) of each group after primary immunization.
secondary_outcome.description: The GMI is the increase of post-immune GMT from pre-immune GMT.
